activity.title: Activity
activity.automationsUpdateError: Couldn't update activity feed automations. Please try again.

software.title: Software
software.tooltipText: Fleet periodically queries all hosts to retrieve software. Click to view hosts for the most up-to-date lists.

mdm.title: Mobile device management (MDM)
mdm.description: MDM is used to change settings and install software on your hosts.
mdm.emptySolutionsInfo: This report is updated every hour to protect the performance of your devices.

welcomeHost.emptyDescription: Add your personal device to assess the security of your device.
welcomeHost.emptySubtext: In Fleet, laptops, workstations, and servers are referred to as "hosts."
welcomeHost.offlineError: Your device is not communicating with Fleet.
welcomeHost.offlineHelp: Join the #fleet Slack channel for help troubleshooting.
welcomeHost.noPoliciesError: No policies apply to your device.
welcomeHost.connectedSuccess: Your host is successfully connected to Fleet.
welcomeHost.policiesBlurb: Fleet already ran the following policies to assess the security of your device:
welcomeHost.viewAllPolicies: Go to Host details to see all policies
welcomeHost.refetchBlurb: Resolved a failing policy? Refetch your host vitals to verify.
welcomeHost.refetchOfflineError: This host is offline. Please try refetching host vitals later.
welcomeHost.refetchTimeoutError: We're having trouble fetching fresh vitals for this host. Please try again later.

learnFleet.description: Want to explore Fleet's features? Learn how to ask questions about your device using queries.

munkiCard.description: Munki is a tool for managing software on macOS devices.
